name: Trust your ears
description:
Hi. I'm new in game developement and this is my first project. Its a verry simple game where you have to find the most many time you can the source of a musique in 2 minute. You can just trust your earing, so a good headphone is preferable. The game is made with Unreal Engine 5 and only use material emeter for lighting, enhancing with Lumen, so not every configuration may be able to run it. Thank you and good luck :)

1.1 : Add dark interlude
